sub_title: Shareholder RevolGreens USA bij Revol Greens
summary:
Started as a sales consultant for Grodan in Tomatoes and later in propagation. After 4 years became product development manager for Grodan propagation products and after that 1 year managing the R&D of Grodan a/i. After that 7 year general manager at Substratus consultancy also giving seminars all over the world about growing on Grodan and consulting big greenhouse companies 6 years. 
From 2003 till 2011 I was owner of a 6 hectare big tomato greenhouse.
As off 2007 till 2013 active as crop consultant, for Green Q in Bleiswijk Netherlands. 
As of 2014 independent crop advisor mainly active in USA, Canada, Germany, Suisse, Greece and Austria. 
As of 1-12-2104 CEO of Gerdi Consult Holding BV.
Consulting greenhouse projects focused on artificial lightening, quality and health doing crop consultancy mainly at leading greenhouse businesses.
End of 2020 started as Director Research and Development at RevolGreens for 50% of my activities

Specialism: Consulting tomatoes, working in a position between growers helping them growing and owners to report the development and needs for future
